name: The Coolester
description:
A Precision/troll platformer from Dee Jay Games and Mean Girls Games production
with additional music by WiL and additional level design from v-rob.

I didn't have a good option for length of play. I estimate 1-3 hours on a first play but most playtimes once practiced will probably be under 30 minutes.

Basics:

* Z jumps, also Z and ENTER select things and advance text.
* Q to beat a level when you're testing it
* Pretty much everything else we tried to explain via UI or level design.

Stay tuned for, in future versions:

* Level selection
* Possible expansion/semi-sequel level pack.

Please feel free to keep future improvements in mind when making your Oktrollberfest judgments; we'd appreciate it. Nonetheless for jam purposes, this is the official entry.

We hope you enjoy it! It's been a big labor of love for all of us.
